data.eml:eml: A new brooding feather star of the genus Dorometra (Echinodermata: Crinoidea: Comatulida: Antedonidae) from the Ryukyu Islands, southwestern Japan

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Obuchi, Masami, Kogo, Ichizo, Fujita, Yoshihisa (2009): A new brooding feather star of the genus Dorometra (Echinodermata: Crinoidea: Comatulida: Antedonidae) from the Ryukyu Islands, southwestern Japan. Zootaxa 2008: 61-68, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.185734
